_meta.source: Researched from New Orleans tourism, Port of New Orleans, and cruise guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers cruise terminal, French Quarter, Garden District, and CBD

transit_routes.name: Walk to French Quarter
transit_routes.note: French Quarter is an easy walk from cruise terminal along the riverfront.

transit_routes.name: St. Charles Streetcar
transit_routes.note: Historic streetcar is attraction itself. Runs through beautiful Garden District.

featured_experiences.name: French Quarter
featured_experiences.note: Heart of New Orleans. Live jazz, incredible food, historic architecture. Don't miss beignets!

featured_experiences.name: National WWII Museum
featured_experiences.note: One of America's best museums. Walking distance from port. Plan significant time.

featured_experiences.name: Garden District
featured_experiences.note: Beautiful historic neighborhood. Take St. Charles streetcar for full experience.
